Insurance

Class LifePolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • Insurance.Policy
      • Insurance.LifePolicy

  • public class LifePolicy
extends Policy
    Life policy class which inherits the policy class to create a life policy object Ashley Moore 19/02/2013
     

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class Insurance.Policy

        policyNumber, year, yearOfPolicy

    • Constructor Detail

      • LifePolicy

        public LifePolicy(int age,
          int covAmount,
          double risk,
          java.lang.String polNum,
          int year)
           throws IllegalPolicyException
        Default constructor for the life policy object which takes five parameters and sets the objects fields to appropriate parameter
        Parameters:
        age - the age of the policy holder
        covAmount - the value of cover
        risk - the risk of the policy
        polNum - the policy ID
        year - the year which the policy was taken
        Throws:
        IllegalPolicyException - if an error occurs
